summary: I am a Software Engineer specializing in AI, skilled in fine-tuning LLMs, RAG, and LangChain for production-ready solutions. Proficient in Python, TensorFlow, PyTorch, and Scikit-Learn, I focus on API design, cloud deployment, and integrating AI models using FastAPI and MERN stack. Experienced with version control, testing, and CI/CD, I ensure scalable, high-performance AI applications.

experience.description: Contributed to AI-driven solutions using LLMs, RAG, and automation technologies. Built GPT-based chatbots for SaaS, real estate, and e-commerce using LangChain and ChromaDB. Created cold email generator and document summarization system.
Developed responsive frontends using React.js and optimized performance. Built dashboards and data visualization components with senior engineers.

Developed and styled responsive front-end interfaces using React.js and Tailwind CSS. Integrated APIs and enhanced user experience with dynamic, interactive components. Collaborated with team to maintain code quality and implement UI improvements.

Improved ML/DL models to enhance chatbot responses and user experience. Preprocessed conversational data, extracted relevant features (like intent, sentiment), and evaluated model performance. Built and fine-tuned models using PyTorch and scikit-learn for tasks like intent classification and response generation.

certifications.name: Fundamentals of AI Agents Using RAG and LangChain
Generative AI Advance Fine-Tuning for LLMs
Generative AI and LLMs: Architecture and Data Preparation

projects.description: Built ML models for real-time crypto forecasting and broker integration. Engineered risk profiles for automated portfolio adjustment.

projects.description: Used BERT to embed lyrics and match evaluation questions via similarity.
